title: 3 and Out -  OTA Opportunities, Steelers Questions, Mark Davis’ Kaepernick PR
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  OTA Opportunities, Steelers Questions, Mark Davis’ Kaepernick PR
description:
John explains how unknown players can make an impression in OTA’s, if the Steelers are due for a franchise regression despite their elite culture, why Mike McDaniel feels like a boom or bust head coach with the Dolphins, why Mark Davis working out Kaepernick feels like a PR stunt, and why Terry McLaurin shouldn’t take a rep until he gets a new deal.

 Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
